PageTitle: Collaborative online office for Nuxeo | ONLYOFFICE Docs
PageDescription: Edit and collaborate on docx, pptx, xlsx, create fillable forms within Nuxeo
Subheader: Edit and co-author office documents online within Nuxeo
FullyCompatibleWithDocxXlsxAndPptx: Work with text documents, spreadsheets, presentations, and forms
MarketplaceConnectorTitle: Designed for seamless integration with Nuxeo
MarketplaceConnectorDescription: Get the ONLYOFFICE connector for Nuxeo now from the <0>Nuxeo Marketplace</0>.
Reason1Description: Work with all major documents formats. Highest compatibility with MS Office guaranteed.
Reason2Description: Utilize hundreds of formatting and styling tools to create beautiful and persuasive documents.
Reason3Description: Extend editor functionality with ready-to-use plugins. Write your own app to add features you miss or ask our developers to do so. Visit our <0>App Directory</0>.
Reason4Description: Documents keep the same formatting and style in any browser on any OS as well as while importing or printing.
Reason5Description: Use two co-editing modes (real-time and paragraph-locking), review and track changes, compare documents, comment or chat.
Reason6Description: Check the source code out on GitHub. Protect your documents from unauthorized access with JWT.
Reason7Description: Choose between multiple deployment options. Easily connect ONLYOFFICE Docs with ready-to-use connector available on the <0>Nuxeo Marketplace</0>.
Reason8Description: ONLYOFFICE Docs can be scaled for team of any size. Even if you have thousands of users!
HowToStartStep1: Nasaďte <0>ONLYOFFICE Docs</0> na svůj vlastní server nebo si vytvořte účet <1>Docs Cloud</1>.
HowToStartStep2: Get the ONLYOFFICE connector from the <0>Nuxeo Marketplace</0>.
NeedAnAppToConnect: Potřebujete aplikaci pro propojení ONLYOFFICE Docs s vaší oblíbenou webovou službou? Nebo jste již nějakou vyvinuli?
